overview: The CEO of N2V (National Net Ventures), one of the largest Internet holding companies in the MENA region with a core business of investing in and accelerating innovative web and mobile web ventures. Al Ballaa is also a board member in N2V parent company, National Technology Group (NTG), and a board member in Mubasher Financial Group; the leading trading network in the region.
